column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Today I found out my bike tire was flat right before I needed to ride it to work .
#id=2
#text=I hurriedly flipped the bike upside down and sat it on the seat .
#id=3
#text=I pulled quick release bolt on the tire and unscrewed it .
#id=4
#text=I disconnected the brakes and removed the wheel from the bike .
#id=5
#text=I then used the tire removal tool so that I could get to the inner tube .
#id=6
#text=I removed the inner tube , and examined where the hole might be .
#id=7
#text=I could not find the hole so I put it into the sink with water .
#id=8
#text=I found the tiny hole in the tube .
#id=9
#text=I used glue and a chunk of rubber from an old inner tube to fix the puncture .
#text=I had to let it dry for a few minutes .
#text=I put the inner tube back onto the rim , and then put the tire back onto the rim .
#text=I fit the tire back onto the bike and screwed the tire on and rode to work .
